alert.note: Alert for Garland; Perry; Saline; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 9:02AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Perry, north central Garland, northwestern Saline and central Yell Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 901 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Plainview in Yell County, or near Danville, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail with heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs Village... Danville... Ola... Plainview in Yell County... Belleville... Corinth... Birta... Carter Cove Park... Nimrod... Macedonia in Yell County... Deberrie... Kingston... Rover... Long Mountain... Fourche Junction... Hollis... Sunlight Bay Park... Garden Point Recreation Area... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Garland; Perry; Saline; Yell Excluding Northwest
